Boise_City.U.S. Bank Plaza (Boise): The US Bank Plaza is a high-rise building located in Boise, Idaho, formerly the tallest building in the state. Completed in 1978 and renovated in 2004, it rises 267 feet (81 m) spanning 19 floors. It was the tallest building in the state for over thirty years, until recently surpassed by the 290-foot (88 m) Boise Airport Air Traffic Control Tower.
